description:
Colorful , stylish, smartly designed 2 BR with sleeper sofa in the living room so my pad can easily sleep 6. 

Looks just like the pics! First Floor so no stairs!

For a nice place for groups of 4-6 on a budget this is a good pick. Two blocks away from a fun strip of Washington Heights 163rd-168th on Broadway with lots of new, hip local restaurants and bars.

2 Queen beds and one nice sleeper sofa

Short walk to Express train on 168th taking you to Times Square area in approximate 20 mins.
name: Sleek Stylish Pad w/ 3 Beds 20 Mins to Times Sq
review: Other than the detail I sent to Ricky, it was a good stay. The kids had fun. I would do it again. Spring is coming so the detail won't matter at all. I give it a 3 out of 5.
